archimate:Goal.name: Achieve Semantic Interoperability
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Definition: Achieve Semantic Interoperability ABB is a Goal. For the purpose of the EIF, interoperability is the ability of organisations to interact towards mutually beneficial goals, involving the sharing of information and knowledge between these organisations, through the business processes they support, by means of the exchange of data between their ICT systems.
Source: EIF
Source reference: https://ec.europa.eu/isa2/sites/isa/files/eif_brochure_final.pdf
Additional information: The interoperability model which is applicable to all digital public services and may also be considered as an integral element of the interoperability-by-design paradigm. It includes: four layers of interoperability: legal, organisational, semantic and technical.
Interoperability Dimension: Behavioral IoP
Viewpoint: Key Interoperability Enablers viewpoint
Identifier: http://data.europa.eu/dr8/AchieveSemanticInteroperabilityGoal
ABB name: eira:AchieveSemanticInteroperabilityGoal
EIRA concept: eira:ArchitectureBuildingBlock
Last modification: 2024-01-28
Identifier: http://data.europa.eu/dr8/AchieveSemanticInteroperabilityGoal
Interoperability Layer: N/A

properties.value: Achieve Semantic Interoperability ABB is a Goal. For the purpose of the EIF, interoperability is the ability of organisations to interact towards mutually beneficial goals, involving the sharing of information and knowledge between these organisations, through the business processes they support, by means of the exchange of data between their ICT systems.

The interoperability model which is applicable to all digital public services and may also be considered as an integral element of the interoperability-by-design paradigm. It includes: four layers of interoperability: legal, organisational, semantic and technical.
